rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall with traditional Kerala-style detailing. Includes reception area, small foyer and space for Vastu compliant placement of water elements.
Open-plan living and dining area with floor-to-ceiling windows that enhance natural light, designed to connect with the garden. Incorporates Kerala-style wooden panels and traditional motifs.

Traditional open-plan kitchen integrated within the living-dining area; equipped for luxury segment, with ample workspace and modern amenities, while maintaining Vastu principles such as placement to southeast.
Guest room designed in a Kerala style with intricate wooden carvings, featuring an adjoining bathroom. Ensures privacy and ample natural light through strategically placed windows.
Utility area including laundry, storage and small pantry. Designed to support the overall functionality of the open-plan kitchen and living space.

Two-car garage integrated into the ground floor plan with easy access from the entrance hall. Features ample parking, secure storage, and a dedicated area for cleaning vehicles, designed following local norms.

openings.description: North-facing grand entrance door with traditional Kerala motifs and Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow.
Floor-to-ceiling windows integrated in living, dining area and kitchen to allow maximum natural light. Placed according to Vastu guidelines for optimal orientation.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet, designed in Kerala style with natural lighting and privacy. Vastu compliant with north-east orientation.
Additional bedroom featuring traditional Kerala decor elements; well ventilated and naturally lit per local building norms.

Shared bathroom for bedrooms, designed with privacy in mind and maintaining a balance of traditional aesthetics with modern amenities. Vastu guidelines ensure proper placement to avoid negative energies.

openings.description: Balcony attached to the master bedroom and living area providing a private outdoor space, enhancing natural light and ventilation. Vastu-compliant placement.
